javadoc:
Ghidra synchronization lock. This class allows creation of named locks for 
 modifying tables in the Ghidra data base. This class also creates an instance
 of a global lock that must first be obtained when synchronizing using multiple
 of the named locks.

methods.javadoc:
Creates an instance of a lock for synchronization within Ghidra.
@param name the name of this lock
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates an instance of a lock for synchronization within Ghidra.

methods.javadoc:
Acquire this synchronization lock. 
 (i.e. begin synchronizing on this named lock.)
methods.name: acquire
methods.comment:
Acquire this synchronization lock. 
 (i.e. begin synchronizing on this named lock.)

methods.javadoc:
Releases this lock, since you are through with the code that needed
 synchronization.
methods.name: release
methods.comment:
Releases this lock, since you are through with the code that needed
 synchronization.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the thread that currently owns the lock.
@return the thread that owns the lock or null.
methods.name: getOwner
methods.comment: Gets the thread that currently owns the lock.

return.comment: the thread that owns the lock or null.

name: Lock
comment:
Ghidra synchronization lock. This class allows creation of named locks for 
 modifying tables in the Ghidra data base. This class also creates an instance
 of a global lock that must first be obtained when synchronizing using multiple
 of the named locks.
